error-login-message: You need to be logged in to use this function!

errors.other-body: There was an error accessing requested resource.
errors.unauthorized-body: No authorization to access requested resource.
errors.unprocessable_entity-body: The registration data is invalid oder incomplete.

render-form.check-previous-submissions-warning: You can check your previous submissions here.
render-form.form-already-submitted-n-times-warning: You already submitted this form {{n}} times. You can't submit it again.
render-form.form-exit-warning-message: Are you sure you want to quit filling out this form? Any unsaved changes may get lost.
render-form.form-not-accessible: This form is not available for you!
render-form.form-not-found: No form is selected to be filled out. Please start the process through the corresponding website.

accessible-exams-form.comment: Note (e.g. if a course cannot be found or for further information)
accessible-exams-form.date-validation-error: Please choose a date that is at least two weeks ahead.
accessible-exams-form.different-term: Different teaching term of the subject
accessible-exams-form.exam-date: Please note that the exam date must be at least 14 days in the future.
accessible-exams-form.examiner-text: Examiner (as text, if examiner was not found)
accessible-exams-form.examiner-validation-error: Please select an examiner, or otherwise enter the name.
accessible-exams-form.mandatory-fields: Please fill in all mandatory fields.
accessible-exams-form.submission-error-notification: Your data could not be submitted. Please try again later.
accessible-exams-form.submission-result-notification: You have registered for an accessible exam date. You will receive a confirmation by e-mail.
accessible-exams-form.time-validation-error: Please choose an end time that is past the begin time of the exam.
accessible-exams-form.title: Register for an accessible exam date

ethics-commission-form.acquisition-of-test-subjects-placeholder: Please describe how you recruit participants for your study and attach any information material, notices, recruitment texts for emails, etc.
ethics-commission-form.adequate-safety-measures-label: Have adequate safety measures been taken to reduce the risk to participants and researchers?
ethics-commission-form.alternatives-to-use-laboratory-animals-l: Are there alternatives to the use of laboratory animals?
ethics-commission-form.applicant-description: For final theses as part of a Bachelor's or Master's degree program, the ethics application must be submitted by the supervisor; doctoral students can also be applicants, the supervisors must be named as co-applicants.
ethics-commission-form.application-reference-number-label: Please state the reference number of the application submitted
ethics-commission-form.appropriate-use-of-resources-label: If so, how do you ensure that resources are used sparingly?
ethics-commission-form.appropriate-use-of-resources-placeholder: Please give one or two examples.
ethics-commission-form.attachment-upload-warning-text: (Documents will get uploaded by saving or submitting the form.)
ethics-commission-form.can-be-done-despite-restrictions-label: How can you make sure that planned theses and publications can actually be done despite restrictions?
ethics-commission-form.cells-obtained-in-research-label: Are the cells or human tissue used in the research project obtained in the course of the research project?
ethics-commission-form.co-applicants-description: Please provide the first and last names of the researchers involved in the study, including their respective affiliation and role in the project.
ethics-commission-form.co-applicants-placeholder: Other researchers/institutions involved in your study (internal/external)
ethics-commission-form.commercially-available-cells-label: Are the cells or human tissue used in the research project commercially available?
ethics-commission-form.consequences-of-blocking-label: What consequences can researchers expect from restricting (especially with regard to final theses)?
ethics-commission-form.data-source-placeholder: Please briefly describe where the data comes from (e.g.: is it collected by yourself, does it come from open data sources or from research partners, ...)
ethics-commission-form.dead-bodies-label: Are dead bodies/cadaver (parts) used in the course of the research project?
ethics-commission-form.dead-bodies-subtitle: Are dead bodies/cadaver (parts) used in the course of the research project?
ethics-commission-form.disturbance-of-peace-of-dead-label: Can a disturbance of the peace of the dead be ruled out?
ethics-commission-form.diversity-aspects-examples-label: If so, how? Please give one or two examples here.
ethics-commission-form.employment-contract-label: Does your research project involve short-term employment contracts (up to one year)?
ethics-commission-form.endangered-species-label: Do these animals belong to an endangered species?
ethics-commission-form.ethical-issues-label: Do the activities carried out in third countries potentially touch on ethical issues either from an EU perspective or from the perspective of the third country?
ethics-commission-form.expose-participants-to-risk-label: Could participation in the research project expose the participants to a risk due to the situation in the relevant third country or in the country outside the EU?
ethics-commission-form.fair-compensation-label: Is there appropriate and fair remuneration for different activities in the project (e.g. also for annotating and processing data records)?
ethics-commission-form.fields-of-expertise-label: To which field(s) of expertise is the research project assigned?
ethics-commission-form.founding-placeholder:
1) Information on the type of funding (e.g.: third-party funding, ...)
2) Details of the funding body funding your project (or the funding body e.g.: FWF, FFG)
3) Information on the project volume or on the amount of funding
ethics-commission-form.harmful-substances-label: Can your research project have a negative impact on the environment, animals, and/or plants?
ethics-commission-form.harmful-substances-on-subjects-label: Are substances used that could have potentially harmful consequences for participants and/or researchers?
ethics-commission-form.has-any-risks-label: Taking all the answers into account, do you see any risks or consequences?
ethics-commission-form.has-confidential-part-label: Are the results of your research project or parts thereof subject to confidentiality or is publication and/or further use prohibited
ethics-commission-form.has-conflict-in-content-control-label: Can there be conflicts of interest regarding the content control of the publication?
ethics-commission-form.has-conflict-of-interest-label: Are there possible conflicts of interest with the funding body/client or with project partners?
ethics-commission-form.has-dual-use-label: Could your research results or parts thereof be used further (dual use, e.g.: in the context of military research, surveillance)?
ethics-commission-form.has-ethical-issues-label: Does the development and/or use of these information processing systems raise any other ethical issues not covered by the list?
ethics-commission-form.has-negative-effects-label: Are negative effects on individuals and/or society to be expected (e.g.: Restriction of personal autonomy, possible loss of skills due to increasing automation - 'deskilling', possible effects on the labor market, discrimination)
ethics-commission-form.human-participants-subtitle: Humans as participants in the research project
ethics-commission-form.human-stem-cells-label: Does the research project involve the use of human (stem) cells, human tissue, or embryos or fetuses?
ethics-commission-form.human-stem-cells-subtitle: Does the research project involve the use of human (stem) cells, human tissue, or embryos or fetuses?
ethics-commission-form.human-stem-cells-used-label: Does the research project involve the use of human stem cells?
ethics-commission-form.human-tissue-used-label: Does the research project involve the use of human cells or human tissue?
ethics-commission-form.import-material-from-third-countries-lab: Are there plans to import material (other than data) from third countries into the EU or other third countries?
ethics-commission-form.influence-on-brain-activity-label: Are techniques used that have an influence on brain activity (e.g.: influencing or stimulating neuronal processes)?
ethics-commission-form.interventions-subtitle: Physical or psychological interventions on participants
ethics-commission-form.invasive-techniques-used-label: Are invasive techniques used (e.g.: for administering medication or contrast media, taking tissue samples, inserting implants, etc.)?
ethics-commission-form.is-publication-planned-label: Is the publication of results also planned as part of the supervision?
ethics-commission-form.is-risk-justified-label: Do the benefits of the study justify the risks for the laboratory animals?
ethics-commission-form.is-self-experiment-label: Is this a self-experiment in which you yourself are a participant?
ethics-commission-form.laboratory-animals-harmed-label: Could laboratory animals be harmed in the course of the research project?
ethics-commission-form.low-income-countries-label: Does the research project include lower and/or lower-middle income countries?
ethics-commission-form.nature-of-blocking-label: What type of restriction is this?
ethics-commission-form.negative-impacts-on-nature-label: Are there any potential negative effects on endangered species (animals or plants), conservation areas, or biodiversity?
ethics-commission-form.negative-social-consequences-label: Can the information processing systems used in the research project potentially lead to negative social consequences?
ethics-commission-form.non-eu-countries-label: Will part of the research project be carried out outside the EU/in third countries?
ethics-commission-form.non-human-primates-label: Are these non-human primates (monkeys, chimpanzees, gorillas, etc.)?
ethics-commission-form.one-publication-label: yes, a publication of results from the thesis/theses is planned
ethics-commission-form.other-comments-on-information-processing: Other comments on Information Processing Systems
ethics-commission-form.participation-criteria-label: Are there inclusion and exclusion criteria for engaging as a participant in your study? If so, what are they?
ethics-commission-form.participation-criteria-placeholder:
Specification of inclusion and exclusion criteria
e.g.: Age, (pre-)illness, pregnancy, ...
ethics-commission-form.potentially-stigmatize-people-label: Can the information processing systems used in the research project potentially stigmatize or discriminate against people?
ethics-commission-form.project-start-date-label: Planned start and period of the research project
ethics-commission-form.project-start-date-placeholder: Indication of the planned start date and time period for conducting your study
ethics-commission-form.provision-for-appropriate-recognition-la: Is there provision for appropriate recognition of their efforts?
ethics-commission-form.qualification-work-label:
Will final theses also be carried out as part of the research project?
If so, which theses?
ethics-commission-form.question-research-founds-label: Does this raise questions about how research funds are distributed?
ethics-commission-form.reason-of-blocking-label: What is the reason for the restriction?
ethics-commission-form.reason-of-submission-label: Reason for submission (e.g.: interest, requirement for a publication, etc.)
ethics-commission-form.related-to-development-of-weapons-label: Is your project related to the development of weapons systems?
ethics-commission-form.replace-human-decision-making-label: Can the information processing systems used in the research project influence, replace, or circumvent human decision-making processes?
ethics-commission-form.risk-of-reputation-damage-label: Is there a risk of reputational damage for Graz University of Technology?
ethics-commission-form.scroll-to-bottom-text: Scroll to the bottom of the page
ethics-commission-form.scroll-to-top-text: Scroll to the top of the page
ethics-commission-form.section-animals-involved-label: Are animals used in the course of the research project?
ethics-commission-form.section-i-description-1: Description of the objective and the scientific background of your research project (including relevant literature).
ethics-commission-form.section-i-description-2: Description of the study procedure and explanation of the methods used and the role and tasks of the participants involved.
ethics-commission-form.section-i-description-3: Description of the devices/equipment used, including brand and manufacturer.
ethics-commission-form.section-i-description-4: Risk-benefit considerations: What are the risks (inconveniences, dangers, burdens) or side effects for the participants in relation to the benefits of the results of the research project?
ethics-commission-form.section-i-title: I. Description of the research project (max. 2 pages)
ethics-commission-form.section-iii-description: Please complete the following criteria catalog carefully. Indicate which criteria apply to your research project and which do not.
ethics-commission-form.section-information-systems-subtitle: Information processing systems are generally used in the research process. Therefore, please answer the following questions.
ethics-commission-form.section-non-eu-countries-subtitle: Research projects outside the EU or in third countries
ethics-commission-form.section-working-conditions-title: Working conditions in the research project
ethics-commission-form.short-description-placeholder: Please describe the aim and procedure of your study/publication briefly and in full sentences (max. 300 words).
ethics-commission-form.specific-technology-assessment-label: Is a specific technology assessment planned as part of your research project?
ethics-commission-form.stem-cells-from-embryos-destroyed-label: Are these destroyed in the course of research?
ethics-commission-form.stem-cells-from-embryos-label: Are the stem cells obtained directly from embryos?
ethics-commission-form.study-description-label: Study description, criteria catalog, informed consent
ethics-commission-form.subjects-dependencies-description: A person cannot participate as participant in your study if they are dependent on the study management in terms of study law or labor law (e.g.: employees of the same institute as participants).
ethics-commission-form.subjects-dependencies-label: Are there any partialities or dependencies in your study (see also 1.1.6. of the criteria catalog)?
ethics-commission-form.subjects-dependencies-placeholder: Disclosure of partialities or dependencies or confirmation that no persons are involved as participants who are dependent on the study management under study or employment law.
ethics-commission-form.submission-result-notification: You have successfully submitted the Ethics Commission Form
ethics-commission-form.test-subject-description: (e.g.: through interviews; via audio and/or video recorded observations; during technology/prototype testing)
ethics-commission-form.test-subjects-consent-signed-label: Is it ensured that participation only takes place after informed consent has been signed by the participants and/or their legal representatives?
ethics-commission-form.test-subjects-dependent-label: Do humans who are dependent on the study management in terms of study law and/or labor law (e.g.: employees of the same institute) take part in the study as participants?
ethics-commission-form.test-subjects-harmed-label: Could participants be harmed or are there possible risks or negative consequences?
ethics-commission-form.test-subjects-informed-consent-label: Were the participants comprehensively informed in advance about the study being conducted on them in plain and intelligible language (informed consent)?
ethics-commission-form.test-subjects-label: Does the research project involve human participants?
ethics-commission-form.test-subjects-reasonable-to-participate-: Is it reasonable to expect the participants to engage in the study as a whole?
ethics-commission-form.test-subjects-risk-minimized-label: Have all steps been taken to minimize the risks?
ethics-commission-form.test-subjects-risks-justified-label: Do the benefits of the study justify the risks for the participants?
ethics-commission-form.test-subjects-tortured-label: Does participation in the study lead to at least one of the following consequences, such as the experience of humiliation, shame, torture, pain, psychological pressure or above-average stress, severe strain on the human sensory system, or any other consequence?
ethics-commission-form.test-subjects-voluntary-label: Do the participants take part in the study voluntarily?
ethics-commission-form.test-subjects-vulnerable-label: Are other potentially vulnerable humans involved (children, persons unable to give consent, victims of abuse or violence, etc.)?
ethics-commission-form.test-subjects-withdraw-possible-label: Is it possible to withdraw from participation without personal negative consequences?
ethics-commission-form.third-countries-local-resources-label: Are there plans to use local resources in third countries?
ethics-commission-form.tissue-or-cells-source-label: Where do the tissue or stem cells used in the research project come from?
ethics-commission-form.title: Application for a review of the ethical acceptability of the submitted research project
ethics-commission-form.use-of-human-embryos-label: Does the research project involve the use of human embryos or fetuses?
ethics-commission-form.user-title: Title of the research project or publication
ethics-commission-form.volunteers-compensation-description: According to the procurement guidelines, employees of TU Graz cannot receive compensation for participating in studies as participants.
ethics-commission-form.volunteers-compensation-early-end-label: Do the participants receive appropriate compensation even if they terminate their participation prematurely?
ethics-commission-form.volunteers-compensation-early-end-placeh: Information on the type and amount of compensation for participants who terminate their participation in the study prematurely.
ethics-commission-form.volunteers-compensation-label: What compensation do the participants receive?
ethics-commission-form.volunteers-compensation-placeholder: Information on the type and amount of compensation for participants for their participation in the study.
ethics-commission-form.weapon-system-label: Does the research project involve the use of information processing systems in a weapon system?
ethics-commission-form.work-life-balance-label: Are work-life balance aspects adequately considered (including in project planning)?

show-submissions.delete-confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected submission(s)? This action cannot be undone.
show-submissions.failed-to-get-forms-body: Failed to get form list from the API
show-submissions.name: Name
